Articles.Content: Just started a new game with very little but Kerbalism as a mod (Engineering Redux, Alarm Clock, Mechjeb2). I can’t do fuel transfer between tanks as I could in a stock game. Is this the mod causing this, do I need to unlock this somehow?
No it is Stock. You need to unlock the fuel lines in the tech tree when you are in career.
You need to upgrade the Research Facility to level 2 to allow fuel transfers
